revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Portable NAS |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Marvell |model = UGNAS-P30855 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Topkick1281P2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = IXMUGNAS-P3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6283; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U4G8F2DTR-BC; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = (CMOS) Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L4006E; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83DFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 40:2C:F4 |oui = DC:85:DE
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell (v3.4.27); |stockos = Linux;2.6.38.8mm;Debian 6;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = SMBUS Advanced Power Controller;Nuvoton;NCT3012S;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, 0.8A Low Dropout Regulator;Analog Integrations Corporation;AIC1117;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.58.100 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = root |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = USI |manuf_model = Topkick 1281P2 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/29/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NM313S |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8786; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM version of [[TonidoPlug 2]]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6283 @800MHz ARM (v5) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 512KB (CMOS) Serial Flash, :512MB NAND Flash, SATA II Port *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 100-240V/0.3A via C7
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:UGNAS-P30855 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:UGNAS-P30855 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
